description:
When Steven showed up for his first video, I pegged him for the quiet type. I had no idea he had such a wild side to him. Apparently he was involved in a recent game of “strip cup” that he thought he was “winning” and he ended up streaking down the street while some of his friends captured it on their cell phones.
Jess, on the other hand has been laying fairly low, only because of the recent release of a video game that he can’t get enough of. I didn’t think he had that side to him considering he usually spends most of his free time at the beach. So Steven isn’t as shy, and Jess likes his downtime.
Luckily for me, they both love fucking. I could tell that Jess was really horny. He wanted to get the small talk over with and get right into Steven’s smooth tight muscled ass. Steven took it deep and hard — and that is no small feat when it come to Jess! The best part was seeing Steven’s hard cock bounce as he got fucked. Jess sent Steven into that “trance” where his eyes rolled back and he enjoyed every inch. Jess was definitely hitting the right spot!
title: Steven & Jess
